verses.verse: And there shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> a rod <S%H2415><s%> out of the stem <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1503><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> and a Branch <S%H5342><s%> shall grow <S%H6509><s%> out of his roots: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8328><s%>

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall rest <S%H5117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding, <S%H998><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of counsel <S%H6098><s%> and might, <S%H1369><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and of the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

And shall make him of quick understanding <S%H7306><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and he shall not <S%H3808><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> after the sight <S%H4758><s%> of his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> reprove <S%H3198><s%> after the hearing <S%H4926><s%> of his ears: <S%H241><s%>

But with righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall he judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> and reprove <S%H3198><s%> with equity <S%H4334><s%> for the meek <S%H6035><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> and he shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and with the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%> shall he slay <S%H4191><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
And righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the girdle <S%H232><s%> of his loins, <S%H4975><s%> and faithfulness <S%H530><s%> the girdle <S%H232><s%> of his reins. <S%H2504><s%>

The wolf <S%H2061><s%> also shall dwell <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the lamb, <S%H3532><s%> and the leopard <S%H5246><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the kid; <S%H1423><s%> and the calf <S%H5695><s%> and the young lion <S%H3715><s%> and the fatling <S%H4806><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%> and a little <S%H6996><s%> child <S%H5288><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> them.

And the cow <S%H6510><s%> and the bear <S%H1677><s%> shall feed; <S%H7462><s%> their young ones <S%H3206><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the ox. <S%H1241><s%>

And the sucking <S%H3243><s%> child shall play <S%H8173><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the hole <S%H2352><s%> of the asp, <S%H6620><s%> and the weaned child <S%H1580><s%> shall put <S%H1911><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the cockatrice's <S%H6848><s%> den. <S%H3975><s%>

They shall not <S%H3808><s%> hurt <S%H7489><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain: <S%H2022><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1844><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a root <S%H8328><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> for an ensign <S%H5251><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> to <S%H413><s%> it shall the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> seek: <S%H1875><s%> and his rest <S%H4496><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> glorious. <S%H3519><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall set his hand <S%H3027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%> to recover <S%H7069><s%> <S%H853><s%> the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be left, <S%H7604><s%> from Assyria, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H804><s%> and from Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and from Pathros, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6624><s%> and from Cush, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3568><s%> and from Elam, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5867><s%> and from Shinar, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8152><s%> and from Hamath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2574><s%> and from the islands <S%H4480><s%> <S%H339><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And he shall set up <S%H5375><s%> an ensign <S%H5251><s%> for the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and shall assemble <S%H622><s%> the outcasts <S%H5080><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and gather together <S%H6908><s%> the dispersed <S%H5310><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from the four <S%H4480><s%> <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The envy <S%H7068><s%> also of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall depart, <S%H5493><s%> and the adversaries <S%H6887><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be cut off: <S%H3772><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> envy <S%H7065><s%> <S%H853><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> vex <S%H6887><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

But they shall fly <S%H5774><s%> upon the shoulders <S%H3802><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> toward the west; <S%H3220><s%> they shall spoil <S%H962><s%> <S%H853><s%> them <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> they shall lay <S%H4916><s%> their hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%> and Moab; <S%H4124><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> shall obey <S%H4928><s%> them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> sea; <S%H3220><s%> and with his mighty <S%H5868><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall he shake <S%H5130><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the river, <S%H5104><s%> and shall smite <S%H5221><s%> it in the seven <S%H7651><s%> streams, <S%H5158><s%> and make men go over <S%H1869><s%> dry-shod. <S%H5275><s%>

And there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a highway <S%H4546><s%> for the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be left, <S%H7604><s%> from Assyria; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H804><s%> like as <S%H834><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he came up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
